title: Hardware Development Engineer
summary: Apple is seeking an enthusiastic electrical engineer for the Mac Engineering Team...
description: The Hardware engineer will be a part of the Mac team. The candidate will design, implement, test, and debug the electrical subsystem, develop test and failure analysis procedures to ensure a high level of quality for the product...
preferred_qualifications:
Minimum 5 years relevant industry experience. High-volume consumer electronics system experience preferred
Lab skills: oscilloscopes, logic analyzers, electronic loads
Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Command line interface and scripting skills
Specific deep expertise in several of the following areas is a plus: CPU or GPU microarchitecture, batteries, power management, analog design, audio, wireless, DisplayPort, PCIe, Thunderbolt, USB, SPI, I2C, UART, analog sensors, interconnect
Statistical data analysis and visualization (ex. JMP) is a plus.
